        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www.tkukoulu.fi/~heliolli/vepotut/kaupunkisanasto1.htm</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A town glossary</string>
            <string language="fi">Kaupunkisanasto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Stadtglossar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un glossaire de ville</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um glossário da cidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un glossario della città</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα πόλης γλωσσάρι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un glosario de la ciudad</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <language>ru</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A connection exercise where words related to towns are connected with the correct counterpart in Russian.</string>
            <string language="fi">Yhdistelytehtävä, jossa yhdistetään kaupunkeihin liittyviä sanoja oikeaan venäjänkieliseen vastineeseen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">Opetushallitus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anschlußübung, in der die Wörter, die auf 
Städten in Verbindung gestanden werden, mit den korrekten 
Gegenstücken auf russisch angeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice de connexion où des mots liés aux 
villes sont reliés aux contre-parties correctes dans le Russe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício da conexão onde as palavras 
relacionadas às cidades sejam conectadas com as contrapartes corretas
no russian.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione del collegamento dove le parole 
relative alle città sono collegate con le controparti corrette nel 
Russo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση σύνδεσης όπου οι λέξεις σχετικές με τις 
πόλεις συνδέονται με το σωστό αντίστοιχο στα ρωσικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio de la conexión donde las palabras 
relacionadas con las ciudades están conectadas con las contrapartes 
correctas en ruso.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
